title: Chronicles of Ryan the Wizard - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   Shounen   Xuanhuan
author: Vigorous Life   Wuxian Shengji   无限生机
description: The greatest wizard isn’t someone who just wields great power, but someone who can control that power. When the day, you can cast a fireball under your feet to destroy your enemy without hurting yourself comes, that would be the beginning.>
